  • Method Details

    • findMovie

      int findMovie(int movieID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Searches the MovieManager's movies array and returns the index of the movie with the requested movieID.
      Parameters:
      movieID - of movie to return
      Returns:
      the index of the requested movie in the movies array.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movie is not found.

    • findMoviebyName

      Movie findMoviebyName(String movieTitle) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the movie object if the movieTitle is the same as the requested string.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - to search for.
      Returns:
      the movie object of the requested movie.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movie is not found.

    • getMoviefromID

      Movie getMoviefromID(int movieID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the movie object if the movieID is the same as the requested integer.
      Parameters:
      movieID - to search for.
      Returns:
      the movie object of the requested movie.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movie is not found.

    • createMovie

      void createMovie(String movieTitle, MovieStatus movieStatus, String synopsis, String director, String cast, AgeRestriction ageRestriction, MovieType movieType, int duration) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Instantiates a movie object based after checking the function arguments and checking for input errors. If the movie object is succesfully instantiated, it is added to the movies array of the MovieManager.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - String to be added.
      movieStatus - MovieStatus object to be set.
      synopsis - String to be added.
      director - String to be added.
      cast - String to be added.
      ageRestriction - AgeRestriction object to be added.
      movieType - MovieType object to be added.
      duration - integer value to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if arguments are invalid.

    • deleteMovie

      void deleteMovie(int movieID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Searches the movies array of the MovieManager object and deletes the Movie from the array if it is found.
      Parameters:
      movieID - to return the status for.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movieID to delete is not found.

    • getMovieStatus

      MovieStatus getMovieStatus(int movieID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Searches the movies array of the MovieManager object and returns the MovieStatus if available.
      Parameters:
      movieID - to return the status for.
      Returns:
      MovieStatus object for the requested movie.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movie is not found.

    • setMovieStatus

      void setMovieStatus(int movieID, MovieStatus status) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the MovieStatus value for the requested movieID in the function.
      Parameters:
      movieID - to set the movieStatus for.
      status - to set the movieStatus to.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movie is not found.

    • getMovieDirector

      String getMovieDirector(int movieID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the String value of the Director attribute for the movie with the given movieID.
      Parameters:
      movieID - to get the director for
      Returns:
      String value of director attribute.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if movie is not found.

    • setMovieDirector

      void setMovieDirector(int movieID, String directorName) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the MovieDirector attribute for the requested movieID.
      Parameters:
      movieID - to set the director for
      directorName - String value to set the director to.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if directorName is an empty string or if movie is not found.

    • getMovieType

      movieID - to get the MovieType for
      Returns:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if requested movie is not found.
